description: Describes the settings that a bot has for a specific locale.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The identifier of the bot associated with the locale.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot associated with the locale.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the locale to describe. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported languages.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot associated with the locale.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot associated with the locale.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the described locale.

nested_items.name: localeName
nested_items.description: The name of the locale.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the locale.

nested_items.name: nluIntentConfidenceThreshold
nested_items.description: The confidence threshold where Amazon Lex inserts the AMAZON.FallbackIntent and AMAZON.KendraSearchIntent intents in the list of possible intents for an utterance.

nested_items.name: voiceSettings
nested_items.description: The Amazon Polly voice Amazon Lex uses for voice interaction with the user.

nested_items.name: voiceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Polly voice to use.

nested_items.name: engine
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of Amazon Polly voice that Amazon Lex should use for voice interaction with the user. For more information, see the engine parameter of the SynthesizeSpeech operation in the Amazon Polly developer guide.

nested_items.name: intentsCount
nested_items.description: The number of intents defined for the locale.

nested_items.name: slotTypesCount
nested_items.description: The number of slot types defined for the locale.

nested_items.name: botLocaleStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the bot. If the status is Failed, the reasons for the failure are listed in the failureReasons field.

nested_items.name: failureReasons
nested_items.description: if botLocaleStatus is Failed, Amazon Lex explains why it failed to build the bot.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the locale was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the locale was last updated.

nested_items.name: lastBuildSubmittedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the locale was last submitted for building.

nested_items.name: botLocaleHistoryEvents
nested_items.description: History of changes, such as when a locale is used in an alias, that have taken place for the locale.

nested_items.name: event
nested_items.description: A description of the event that occurred.

nested_items.name: eventDate
nested_items.description: A timestamp of the date and time that the event occurred.

nested_items.name: recommendedActions
nested_items.description: Recommended actions to take to resolve an error in the failureReasons field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: generativeAISettings
nested_items.description: Contains settings for Amazon Bedrock's generative AI features for your bot locale.

nested_items.name: runtimeSettings
nested_items.description: Contains specifications about the Amazon Lex runtime generative AI capabilities from Amazon Bedrock that you can turn on for your bot.

nested_items.name: slotResolutionImprovement
nested_items.description: An object containing specifications for the assisted slot resolution feature.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether assisted slot resolution is turned on or off.

nested_items.name: bedrockModelSpecification
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the Amazon Bedrock model used to assist slot resolution.

nested_items.name: modelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the foundation model used in descriptive bot building.

nested_items.name: guardrail
nested_items.description: The guardrail configuration in the Bedrock model specification details.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: The unique guardrail id for the Bedrock guardrail configuration.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The guardrail version for the Bedrock guardrail configuration.

nested_items.name: traceStatus
nested_items.description: The Bedrock trace status in the Bedrock model specification details.

nested_items.name: customPrompt
nested_items.description: The custom prompt used in the Bedrock model specification details.

nested_items.name: buildtimeSettings
nested_items.description: Contains specifications about the Amazon Lex build time generative AI capabilities from Amazon Bedrock that you can turn on for your bot.

nested_items.name: descriptiveBotBuilder
nested_items.description: An object containing specifications for the descriptive bot building feature.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the descriptive bot building feature is activated or not.

nested_items.name: bedrockModelSpecification
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the Amazon Bedrock model used to interpret the prompt used in descriptive bot building.

nested_items.name: modelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the foundation model used in descriptive bot building.

nested_items.name: guardrail
nested_items.description: The guardrail configuration in the Bedrock model specification details.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: The unique guardrail id for the Bedrock guardrail configuration.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The guardrail version for the Bedrock guardrail configuration.

nested_items.name: traceStatus
nested_items.description: The Bedrock trace status in the Bedrock model specification details.

nested_items.name: customPrompt
nested_items.description: The custom prompt used in the Bedrock model specification details.

nested_items.name: sampleUtteranceGeneration
nested_items.description: Contains specifications for the sample utterance generation feature.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to enable sample utterance generation or not.

nested_items.name: bedrockModelSpecification
nested_items.description: Contains information about the Amazon Bedrock model used to interpret the prompt used in descriptive bot building.

nested_items.name: modelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the foundation model used in descriptive bot building.

nested_items.name: guardrail
nested_items.description: The guardrail configuration in the Bedrock model specification details.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: The unique guardrail id for the Bedrock guardrail configuration.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The guardrail version for the Bedrock guardrail configuration.

nested_items.name: traceStatus
nested_items.description: The Bedrock trace status in the Bedrock model specification details.

nested_items.name: customPrompt
nested_items.description: The custom prompt used in the Bedrock model specification details.
